This is probably my favorite single player story game. It's intense, puzzling, and hilarious. I love sitting and listening to the characters talk for minutes about nothing. 10/10

Portal?Valve?Sim sim vamos analisar este jogo!!

Sério eu agradeço a Alá,Jesus e Buda por ter o luxo de poder jogar essa obra prima!

Praticamente se você se considera um gamer,você tem que ter o Portal 2,pois é um jogo tão simplês,e é essa simplicidade que o prende no jogo.

Sério não tenho nada a que reclamar,só a agradecer,pois nunca tive problema com o jogo,muito menos com a comunidade dele,nunca vi uma FanBase tão bem organizada e disposta a explorar o jogo,se você está jogando multiplayer,e é um iniciante,fique tranquilo,os jogadores custumam a sempre o ajudar,não importa se é culpa sua ou não

Eu sempre tento ser o mais detalhado possivel,más esse jogo é uma obra prima,Obrigado Valve,continue com esse sucesso!
i cannot find my dad
I LOVE THIS GAME!!!! It's so fun and I love the 2 player function. (Puzzle games are the best) Probably my favorite game of all time. Money well spent!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Probably one of the best (and most unique) puzzle games on the market. Really theres nothing else to say...if you like puzzle games  just but it.
一个好的解谜类游戏，就该像portal2一样

Great fun for such an old game. Was not a moment when I regreted purchasing this game. And for those who play it once. Play it agian or co operative with frineds and then switch those friends and you may find new solutions to old puzzles

The sequel to the first game, Portal 2 is a first person puzzle where you shoot portals to solve puzzles and challenges. The game is longer then the first game, and it also has a coop story, but it's different from the first game. You can also download and create maps and upload and/or play them from the workshop. Last important feature is kinda the same feature from Team Fortress 2, there are cosmetics and taunts for the protagonists you play as in coop. There arent that many though, compared to TF2. The game could be laggy on systems a little worse that the minimal specs required to run it, but you can turn down the settings. I recommend this game, but I also recommend getting the first game to understand the story more within the Portal universe.
A complicated game that will blow your mind for sure. Good gameplay and a cool ending, I'd play it again but I'm a noob.

Bardzo fajna i wyróżniająca się gra. Pobudza myślenie i zostawia trwałe ślady w mózgu :P oczywiście w pozutywnym tego słowa znaczeniu ;)
Poziom zagadek rośnie rozsądnie i jest fajnie dawkowany, jeśli nie posilamy się solucjami w pierwszym etapie to później nasz skill będzie tylko rósł. 
Bardzo polecam, warto ruszyć szare komórki i zawiązać nowe połączenia neuronów ;)
Для профи

I recieved this game as a christmas present way back in the year of 2011.
I played it straight through. 
I didn't play anything else.
I stopped only to eat, sleep, and bathroom.
I now do this every christmas, as a tradition.
Portal 2 is a masterclass of game design, character development, and world building.
This is as close as I have ever gotten to playing a perfect game.
Portal 2 is legitimately one of the greatest games ever made.
よい！

一场无与伦比的解密体验
优点：
-补充了前作的情节：你能想象一个全程从没说过话的主角外加俩个人工智能之间发生的故事获得了游戏剧情大奖么？
-有魅力的反派：GLAdos wheatley
-继承了前作全部解密精华的基础上，新加入了三种胶等有趣的解秘题材
-丰富的彩蛋
-经典valve游戏脚本电影式的过场

One of if not the best pc games I've ever played, great replay value, great multiplayer. 10/10

I love this game so much. Now, I'm not always the one for puzzle games or sci fi adventures, but this one is so well executed and so well thought out that Valve manages to really pull it off. I've played 28 hours and I'm still not tired of it. The plot is entriguing. The twists still get me every time. Some of the more humorous scenes had me laughing to tears. The originality of the game mechanics, the gravity, the general ambience and "post-apocalyptic underground testing facility" aesthetic, all of these things have me playing it again and again and again. I truly couldn't recommend this game enough, 9.5/10.

优点:
1，游戏很好玩，关卡难度设定偏简单。2，剧情一直设伏笔，很想玩下去。3有多人联机模式，虽然没有尝试过，但好评。4，中文优化好评。
缺点:
感觉关卡游戏有点长。没有进度指示。第4章玩过感觉差不多了要结束了，一查居然有9章，长征才过了雪山，草地还没过呢。但我是不是赚到了，捂脸。暂且归为缺点。
总体好评

One of the best games you can ever buy on Steam. The Single player is just amazing and the Cooperative is spectacular. Lots of content created by the players inlcuding 2 mods that will add up to more than 20 hours. Totally worth it. Start playing it now.
